Class ContinuousQueryListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.spark.sql.util.ContinuousQueryListener

  • public abstract class ContinuousQueryListener
extends java.lang.Object
    :: Experimental :: Interface for listening to events related to ContinuousQueries.
